name: Environaut\Checks\Validator
short_desc: Default validator class that may be used in checks for common types of data (esp.

readableDirectory.name: readableDirectory
readableDirectory.short_desc: Validates the given path and throws an exception if it is not a regular directory or readable.
exceptions: \InvalidArgumentException
in case of validation errors (empty value, irregular or non-readable directory)

writableDirectory.name: writableDirectory
writableDirectory.short_desc: Validates the given path and throws an exception if it is not a regular directory or writable.
exceptions: \InvalidArgumentException
in case of validation errors (empty value, irregular or non-writable directory)

writableFile.name: writableFile
writableFile.short_desc: Validates the given file path and throws an exception if it is not a regular file or writable.
exceptions: \InvalidArgumentException
in case of validation errors (empty value or irregular or non-writable file)

readableFile.name: readableFile
readableFile.short_desc: Validates the given file path and throws an exception if it is not a regular file or readable.
exceptions: \InvalidArgumentException
in case of validation errors (empty value or irregular or non-readable file)

validUrl.name: validUrl
validUrl.short_desc: Validates the given URL and throws an exception if it is not valid (Only http and https are valid as protocols).
exceptions: \InvalidArgumentException
in case of validation errors (invalid or empty URL)

validEmail.name: validEmail
validEmail.short_desc: Validates the given value using the PHP filter_var with FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL option.
exceptions: \InvalidArgumentException
in case of validation errors (invalid or empty email)

validIp.name: validIp
validIp.short_desc: Validates the given value using the PHP filter_var with FILTER_VALIDATE_IP.
validIp.hint_desc: ipv4 or ipv6 (may still be in private or reserved range)
exceptions: \InvalidArgumentException
in case of validation errors (invalid or empty ip)

validIpv4.name: validIpv4
validIpv4.short_desc: Validates the given value using the PHP filter_var with FILTER_VALIDATE_IP and flag FILTER_FLAG_IPV4.
validIpv4.hint_desc: ipv4 (may still be in private or reserved range)
exceptions: \InvalidArgumentException
in case of validation errors (invalid or empty ip)

validIpv4NotReserved.name: validIpv4NotReserved
validIpv4NotReserved.short_desc: Validates the given value using the PHP filter_var with FILTER_VALIDATE_IP and flag FILTER_FLAG_IPV4 | FILTER_FLAG_NO_RES_RANGE.
validIpv4NotReserved.hint_desc: ipv4 (may still be in private range)
exceptions: \InvalidArgumentException
in case of validation errors (invalid or empty ip)

validIpv6.name: validIpv6
validIpv6.short_desc: Validates the given value using the PHP filter_var with FILTER_VALIDATE_IP and flag FILTER_FLAG_IPV6
validIpv6.hint_desc: ipv6 (may still be in private or reserved range)
exceptions: \InvalidArgumentException
in case of validation errors (invalid or empty ip)

fixRelativePath.name: fixRelativePath
fixRelativePath.short_desc: Resolves dots and double slashes in relative paths to get nicer paths: "dev/data/assets/../../foo" will be "dev/foo/" and "foo/./bar" will be "foo/bar" etc.

fixPath.name: fixPath
fixPath.short_desc: Appends '/' to the path if necessary.
